name: checkers
description: pure js, html and css web based pvp checkers from a trillion years ago.  [Play](https://netanel-haber.github.io/checkers/).

scripts.dev: live-server . & nodemon --watch index.js --watch index.css --exec 'uglifyjs index.js -cmo dist/index.min.js --source-map url=index.min.js.map && cp index.css dist/index.css && cp index.js dist/index.js' && insert_sha
